test_cases.message: Class 'ClientAccount' uses 'Client' instead of 'Customer'
Entity 'UserProfile' is defined but the domain specifies 'Customer' terminology
Method 'createBuyerWishlist' uses 'Buyer' instead of 'Customer'
Customer entity does not contain an Address value object as required
Class 'Purchase' is used instead of the required 'Order' entity
Order lifecycle refers to 'Completed' instead of 'Delivered'
Order does not define OrderItem as a child entity
OrderCancelled domain event is not implemented
Class 'Item' is used instead of 'Product' in inventory context
Product stock quantity is stored as a primitive instead of StockLevel value object
StockDepleted event is not triggered when quantity falls below threshold
Class 'MerchandiseCategory' uses banned synonym 'Merchandise'
Payment logic uses 'Transaction' instead of 'Payment'
Payment amount is represented without the Money value object
RefundProcessed event is missing in payment workflow
Inventory Management directly calls Payment Processing services
Payment Processing accesses Inventory data without going through Order Processing
Class name 'OrderManager' uses globally banned term 'Manager'
Utility class 'CustomerHelper' violates banned term 'Helper'
Service named 'PaymentProcessor' violates banned term 'Processor'
Class 'OrderData' uses banned term 'Data'
DTO named 'CustomerInfo' violates banned term 'Info'
API response time exceeds 200ms under normal load
Customer personal data is stored without encryption at rest
Payment information storage does not comply with PCI-DSS standards
